a.xlink:title: Abstract interface for all light sources in the path tracer.
Abstract base class partially implementing the ILight interface.
Declares the scene container: camera, objects, lights, and top-level BVH.
Declares the AmbientLight class: uniform ambient illumination.
Declares the DirectionalLight class: parallel‐ray source.
Implements the scene loading system using libconfig for the raytracer engine.
Declares the main Raytracer application class for program execution and argument handling.
Utility functions and structures for raytracer configuration, rendering and post-processing.
Declares functions to load scenes from configuration files (.cfg) into a Scene object.
Implements the main execution flow of the Raytracer application, including argument parsing,...
Entry point of the raytracer application. Initializes and runs the Raytracer engine.
Implements visualization modes for the raytracer using SFML.
Implements utility functions for argument parsing, rendering, post-processing, and denoising in the r...
